verses.verse: Doth not wisdom <WH2451> cry <WH7121> <WH8799>? and understanding <WH8394> put forth <WH5414> <WH8799> her voice <WH6963> ?
She standeth <WH5324> <WH8738> in the top <WH7218> of high places <WH4791>, by the way <WH1870> in the places <WH1004> of the paths <WH5410>.
She crieth <WH7442> <WH8799> at <WH3027> the gates <WH8179>, at the entry <WH6310> of the city <WH7176>, at the coming <WH3996> in at the doors <WH6607>.
Unto you, O men <WH376>, I call <WH7121> <WH8799>; and my voice <WH6963> is to the sons <WH1121> of man <WH120>.
O ye simple <WH6612>, understand <WH995> <WH8685> wisdom <WH6195>: and, ye fools <WH3684>, be ye of an understanding <WH995> <WH8685> heart <WH3820>.
Hear <WH8085> <WH8798>; for I will speak <WH1696> <WH8762> of excellent things <WH5057>; and the opening <WH4669> of my lips <WH8193> shall be right things <WH4339>.
For my mouth <WH2441> shall speak <WH1897> <WH8799> truth <WH571>; and wickedness <WH7562> is an abomination <WH8441> to my lips <WH8193>.
All the words <WH561> of my mouth <WH6310> are in righteousness <WH6664>; there is nothing froward <WH6617> <WH8737> or perverse <WH6141> in them.
They are all plain <WH5228> to him that understandeth <WH995> <WH8688>, and right <WH3477> to them that find <WH4672> <WH8802> knowledge <WH1847>.
Receive <WH3947> <WH8798> my instruction <WH4148>, and not silver <WH3701>; and knowledge <WH1847> rather than choice <WH977> <WH8737> gold <WH2742>.
For wisdom <WH2451> is better <WH2896> than rubies <WH6443>; and all the things that may be desired <WH2656> are not to be compared <WH7737> <WH8799> to it.
I wisdom <WH2451> dwell <WH7931> <WH8804> with prudence <WH6195>, and find out <WH4672> <WH8799> knowledge <WH1847> of witty inventions <WH4209>.

The fear <WH3374> of the YY <WH3068> is to hate <WH8130> <WH8800> evil <WH7451>: pride <WH1344>, and arrogancy <WH1347>, and the evil <WH7451> way <WH1870>, and the froward <WH8419> mouth <WH6310>, do I hate <WH8130> <WH8804>.
Counsel <WH6098> is mine, and sound wisdom <WH8454>: I am understanding <WH998>; I have strength <WH1369>.
By me kings <WH4428> reign <WH4427> <WH8799>, and princes <WH7336> <WH8802> decree <WH2710> <WH8779> justice <WH6664>.
By me princes <WH8269> rule <WH8323> <WH8799>, and nobles <WH5081>, even all the judges <WH8199> <WH8802> of the earth <WH776>.
I love <WH157> <WH8799> them that love <WH157> <WH8802> me; and those that seek me early <WH7836> <WH8764> shall find <WH4672> <WH8799> me.
Riches <WH6239> and honour <WH3519> are with me; yea, durable <WH6276> riches <WH1952> and righteousness <WH6666>.
My fruit <WH6529> is better <WH2896> than gold <WH2742>, yea, than fine gold <WH6337>; and my revenue <WH8393> than choice <WH977> <WH8737> silver <WH3701>.
I lead <WH1980> <WH8762> in the way <WH734> of righteousness <WH6666>, in the midst <WH8432> of the paths <WH5410> of judgment <WH4941>:
That I may cause those that love <WH157> <WH8802> me to inherit <WH5157> <WH8687> substance <WH3426>; and I will fill <WH4390> <WH8762> their treasures <WH214>.
The YY <WH3068> possessed <WH7069> <WH8804> me in the beginning <WH7225> of his way <WH1870>, before <WH6924> his works <WH4659> of old.
I was set up <WH5258> <WH8738> from everlasting <WH5769>, from the beginning <WH7218>, or ever <WH6924> the earth <WH776> was.
When there were no depths <WH8415>, I was brought forth <WH2342> <WH8797>; when there were no fountains <WH4599> abounding <WH3513> <WH8737> with water <WH4325>.
Before the mountains <WH2022> were settled <WH2883> <WH8717>, before <WH6440> the hills <WH1389> was I brought forth <WH2342> <WH8797>:
While as yet he had not made <WH6213> <WH8804> the earth <WH776>, nor the fields <WH2351>, nor the highest part <WH7218> of the dust <WH6083> of the world <WH8398>.
When he prepared <WH3559> <WH8687> the heavens <WH8064>, I was there: when he set <WH2710> <WH8800> a compass <WH2329> upon the face <WH6440> of the depth <WH8415>:
When he established <WH553> <WH8763> the clouds <WH7834> above <WH4605>: when he strengthened <WH5810> <WH8800> the fountains <WH5869> of the deep <WH8415>:

When he gave <WH7760> <WH8800> to the sea <WH3220> his decree <WH2706>, that the waters <WH4325> should not pass <WH5674> <WH8799> his Mitzvah <WH6310>: when he appointed <WH2710> <WH8800> the foundations <WH4144> of the earth <WH776>:
Then I was by him <WH681>, as one brought up <WH525> with him: and I was daily <WH3117> <WH3117> his delight <WH8191>, rejoicing <WH7832> <WH8764> always <WH6256> before <WH6440> him;
Rejoicing <WH7832> <WH8764> in the habitable part <WH8398> of his earth <WH776>; and my delights <WH8191> were with the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120>.
Now therefore hearken <WH8085> <WH8798> unto me, O ye children <WH1121>: for blessed <WH835> are they that keep <WH8104> <WH8799> my ways <WH1870>.
Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> instruction <WH4148>, and be wise <WH2449> <WH8798>, and refuse <WH6544> <WH8799> it not.

Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH120> that heareth <WH8085> <WH8802> me, watching <WH8245> <WH8800> daily <WH3117> <WH3117> at my gates <WH1817>, waiting <WH8104> <WH8800> at the posts <WH4201> of my doors <WH6607>.
For whoso findeth <WH4672> <WH8802> me findeth <WH4672> <WH8804> <WH8675> <WH4672> <WH8802> life <WH2416>, and shall obtain <WH6329> <WH8686> favour <WH7522> of the YY <WH3068>.
But he that sinneth <WH2398> <WH8802> against me wrongeth <WH2554> <WH8802> his own soul <WH5315>: all they that hate <WH8130> <WH8764> me love <WH157> <WH8804> death <WH4194>.
